name: WarsakenVolkov'sEscape
0:
”Alexa, open Volkov's Escape”
”pick up taser”
”confront him”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: volkov's escape
Developer Terms of Use
des:
In this interactive experience, Alexa guides you as Roman Volkov, the imprisoned former Premier of Trionvice.

Betrayed by those that wanted his Premiership, you must help Roman escape his cell and find his way to freedom; and to revenge.

To launch this skill, say "Open Volkov's Escape." During the game, you can say "repeat options," "go back," or "help" for further assistance.

Parental guidance suggested. Warsaken: Volkov's Escape contains content that may not be suitable for all ages.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
